00003         /*
00004          * The LP initialization routine
00005          */
00006 void
00007 ftp_init(ftp_lp_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00008 {
00009         tw_event        *new_event;
00010         rn_message      *rn_msg;
00011         ftp_message     *ftp_msg;
00012 
00013         bzero(state, sizeof(ftp_lp_state));
00014 
00015         printf("%d: FTP startup complete\n", lp->id);
00016 
00017         if(lp->id != 0)
00018                 return;
00019 
00020         new_event = rn_event_new(lp, 0.0, lp, g_ftp_chunk_size);
00021 
00022         ftp_msg = rn_message_data(rn_msg);
00023         ftp_msg->type = FTP_SEND;
00024                         
00025         rn_event_send(new_event);
00026 
00027         state->bytes_sent += g_ftp_chunk_size;
00028 }
00029 
00030         /*
00031          * The forward computation event-handler routine
00032          */
00033 void
00034 ftp_event_handler(ftp_lp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00035 {
00036         tw_event        *new_event;
00037         rn_message      *new_msg;
00038         ftp_message     *ftp_msg;
00039         tw_stime         ts;
00040 
00041         tw_lpid          dst;
00042 
00043         ts = 0.0;
00044         *(int *)bf = (int)0;
00045 
00046         if(lp->id == 0)
00047                 dst = 2;
00048 
00049         switch(msg->type)
00050         {
00051                 case UPSTREAM:
00052 #if VERIFY_FTP_STATE
00053                         printf("%d: FTP UPSTREAM\n", lp->id);
00054 #endif
00055 
00056                         if(msg->status == COMPLETE)
00057                         {
00058                                 bf->c1 = 1;
00059                         
00060                                 state->bytes_read += msg->size;
00061                                 state->files_read++;
00062                         }
00063                         else
00064                         {
00065                                 if(state->bytes_sent % g_ftp_buffer_size == 0)
00066                                         state->files_sent++;
00067 
00068                                 break;
00069                         }
00070 
00071                         // keep going and send the file back
00072                         // un-comment this line in order to be a sink
00073                         break;
00074                 case DOWNSTREAM:
00075 #if VERIFY_FTP_STATE
00076                         printf("%d: FTP DOWNSTREAM\n", lp->id);
00077 #endif
00078 
00079                         ts += tw_rand_exponential(lp->id, FTP_SEND_TIME);
00080                         new_event = rn_event_new(tw_getlp(dst), ts, lp, g_ftp_chunk_size);
00081                 
00082                         new_msg = rn_event_data(new_event);     
00083                         ftp_msg = rn_message_data(new_msg);
00084                         ftp_msg->type = FTP_READ;
00085                         ftp_msg->size = g_ftp_chunk_size;
00086                 
00087 #if VERIFY_FTP  
00088                         printf("%d: ftp sending %d bytes to lp %d %g\n",
00089                                lp->id, g_ftp_chunk_size, dst, tw_now(lp));
00090 #endif
00091                         
00092                         rn_event_send(new_event);
00093                         
00094                         state->bytes_sent += g_ftp_chunk_size;
00095 
00096                         break;
00097 
00098                 default:
00099                         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unknown ftp event type!");
00100         }
00101 
00102 #if VERIFY_FTP_STATE
00103         printf("%d: FTP EH COMPLETE\n", lp->id);
00104 #endif
00105 }
00106 
00107         /*
00108          * The reverse computation event-handler routine
00109          */
00110 void
00111 ftp_rc_event_handler(ftp_lp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00112 {
00113         switch(msg->type)
00114         {
00115                 case UPSTREAM:
00116 
00117                         if(state->bytes_sent % g_ftp_buffer_size == 0)
00118                                 state->files_sent++;
00119 
00120                         state->bytes_read -= msg->size;
00121 
00122                         if(1 == bf->c1)
00123                         {
00124                                 state->files_read--;
00125                                 break;
00126                         }
00127 
00128                         state->files_read--;
00129 
00130                 case DOWNSTREAM:
00131                         tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->id);
00132                         state->bytes_sent -= g_ftp_chunk_size;
00133 
00134                         break;
00135         }
00136 }
00137 
00138         /*
00139          * Collect the statistics from each LP
00140          */
00141 void
00142 ftp_final(ftp_lp_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00143 {
00144         g_ftp_stats.s_bytes_sent += state->bytes_sent;  
00145         g_ftp_stats.s_bytes_read += state->bytes_read;  
00146 
00147         g_ftp_stats.s_files_sent += state->files_sent;  
00148         g_ftp_stats.s_files_read += state->files_read;  
00149 }
00150 
00151 void
00152 ftp_statistics_print()
00153 {
00154         printf("FTP Model Statistics:\n");
00155 
00156         printf("\t%-32s %11ld\n", "Total Bytes Sent", 
00157                         g_ftp_stats.s_bytes_sent);
00158         printf("\t%-32s %11ld\n", "Total Bytes Read", 
00159                         g_ftp_stats.s_bytes_read);
00160 
00161         printf("\t%-32s %11ld\n", "Total Files Sent", 
00162                         g_ftp_stats.s_files_sent);
00163         printf("\t%-32s %11ld\n", "Total Files Read", 
00164                         g_ftp_stats.s_files_read);
00165 }

00168 
00169 tw_lptype ftp_lps [] = {
00170         {FTP_MODEL, sizeof(ftp_lp_state),
00171          (init_f) ftp_init,
00172          (event_f) ftp_event_handler,
00173          (revent_f) ftp_rc_event_handler,
00174          (final_f) ftp_final,
00175          (statecp_f) NULL}
00176 };

00178 int
00179 main(int argc, char **argv, char **env)
00180 {
00181         int      i;
00182 
00183         tw_lp   *lp;
00184         tw_kp   *kp;
00185         tw_pe   *pe;
00186 
00187         ftp_init(NULL, NULL);
00188 
00189         g_tw_npe = 2;
00190         g_tw_nkp = 2;
00191         g_tw_nlp = 2;
00192 
00193         g_tw_gvt_interval = g_ftp_chunk_size;
00194         g_tw_ts_end = 1000;
00195 
00196         g_tw_events_per_pe = (FTP_START_EVENTS * g_tw_nlp / g_tw_npe) + 
00197                                 (g_ftp_buffer_size / g_ftp_chunk_size) + g_ftp_chunk_size;
00198 
00199         if(!tw_init(ftp_lps, g_tw_npe, g_tw_nkp, g_tw_nlp, sizeof(ftp_message)))
00200                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Could not initialize ROSS!");
00201 
00202         for(i = 0; i < g_tw_nlp; i++)
00203         {
00204                 lp = tw_getlp(i);
00205                 kp = tw_getkp(i % g_tw_nkp);
00206                 pe = tw_getpe(i % g_tw_npe);
00207 
00208                 tw_lp_settype(lp, FTP_MODEL);
00209                 tw_lp_onkp(lp, kp);
00210                 tw_lp_onpe(lp, pe);
00211                 tw_kp_onpe(kp, pe);
00212         }
00213 
00214         bzero(&g_ftp_stats, sizeof(ftp_statistics));
00215 
00216         tw_run();
00217 
00218         ftp_statistics_print();
00219 
00220         return 0;
00221 }
00222 #endif
